text:
Charles Tahan (born June 11, 1998) is an American actor. His notable TV roles include Wyatt Langmore in the Netflix crime drama "Ozark" (2017–present), Ben Burke in the Fox dystopian mystery thriller "Wayward Pines" (2015–2016) and the young Scarecrow in the Fox/DC Comics superhero drama "Gotham" (2014–2017). His movie credits include "Charlie St. Cloud" (2010), "Frankenweenie" (2012) and "Blue Jasmine" (2013).
Tahan was born in Glen Rock, New Jersey. His sister is actress Daisy Tahan.
